summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5824 for the improvement of 31st Avenue Southwest, from West Kenyon Street to West Thistle Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76770 as amended by Ordinance No. 76853, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
